org.schwering.evi.conf
Class ModuleAutoStartConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.schwering.evi.conf.ModuleAutoStartConfiguration
public abstract class ModuleAutoStartConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

Administers the module auto start configuration file. Each entry must be an id of a module. Each of these modules is started automagically when the client starts.
The format of the file is quite simple: 

 my.package.Foobar
 # this is a comment and thus the following module:
 # my.package.IRCModule
 # will not be startet
 this.module.will.be.Started with this string as argument

Version:
$Id: ModuleAutoStartConfiguration.java 19 2006-05-06 20:41:09Z schwering $
Author:
Christoph Schwering (schwering@gmail.com)

Field Detail

MODULE_AUTO_START_CONFIG_FILE

public static final java.io.File MODULE_AUTO_START_CONFIG_FILE
The auto start list.
It is tried to set it to CONFIG_DIR/autostart.

Method Detail

load

public static void load()
Loads the ids of modules that are startet automatically. If an exception is thrown, this method shows an ExceptionDialog. This method also adds a shutdownhook which invokes store().

store

public static void store()
Adds a shutdown hook which invokes store().
